markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enforced Order](/Feats.aspx?ID=2293) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 11 <sup>3.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Lawbringer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1352)

</column>

---

You never fail to strike down the ever-expanding reaches of chaos. All your weapon and unarmed Strikes deal 1 additional lawful damage and have the [lawful](/Traits.aspx?ID=99) and [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) traits.
name: Enforced Order
